text.p: As flood cleanup continues along the Oder River and in Poland in northeastern Europe, drier weather during the next couple days will be more favorable.
In Japan, cleanup will continue in the south after the heavy rains and flooding caused by Rosie. Showers and thunderstorms may add to the problems during the next couple of days.

Major flooding occurred near Fort Collins, Colorado, after heavy, slow-moving thunderstorms dumped several inches of rain. As cleanup gets underway, there is a chance of additional thunderstorms in the region and through much of the Rockies during the next few days. Flooding is possible with some storms.
